item.description:
Isn't it great to surround yourself with like-minded, positive, professionals? And why not sample some great Beers and Wines at the same time ... for FREE?! Sounds too good to be true, but check this out!

Join Successful Anonymous and XTVentures (Host of the 'Free Workshops for Entrepreneurs in Greater Boston' Meet Up Group) for an evening of casual business networking, providing business professionals with an opportunity to meet new people, discuss their career goals, challenges, and aspirations.

Where:
Menotomy Beer & Wine
80 Broadway
Arlington, MA 02474
781-646-0889

Our good friends at Menotomy Beer & Wine have graciously agreed to host this event and put on a special beer & wine tasting just for us. And if you're into this sort of thing, they also host free beer tastings every Fridat and free wine tastings every Saturday, from 4-7pm.

Networking Tips:
1- Bring plenty of business cards!
2- Look at who else has RSVP'd and identify a few people you want to meet!
3- Assume that everyone there has you on their "To Meet" List!
4- SMILE and HAVE FUN!

Looking forward to seeing you there!
Be sure to spread the word and invite your network! The more the merrier!!! :oD
item.name: SA & XTVentures present: Business Networking & FREE Beer & Wine Tasting
